title: Add phone number and email to contact section

requirements.summary: Update ContactSection component to display phone number and email in Let's Connect section
acceptanceCriteria: Phone number '7997411133' is displayed in the contact section with appropriate formatting
Email 'thanishaivana004@gmail.com' is displayed in the contact section
Contact information is visible in the Let's Connect section with consistent styling matching the burgundy/pink theme

file_operations.description: Update the ContactSection component to display the phone number '7997411133' and email 'thanishaivana004@gmail.com' in the contact cards grid. Ensure the contact information is rendered with appropriate icons, maintains the existing burgundy/pink glow hover effects, and preserves the card grid layout structure. The phone and email should be displayed alongside the existing name and LinkedIn fields using the data fetched from the backend ContactInfo query.
